text:
Famous | San Francisco | Sales Executive/Director | Onsite

We are looking for the first sales position to start and build out the team. We need someone who is passionate about the full cycle sales and knows the digital advertising space well.

If interested feel free to email m(at)famo.us with questions and please apply directly here: https://jobs.lever.co/famo.us/e01104e5-ffa5-44f7-ae65-d5efe4...
